Answers.Text: There is no table such as problem_task
It does not extend any table

Text: How is it possible for a non-administrator to develop and deploy applications on the Now Platform?

Answers.Text: Ask the administrators to do it since only administrators have this level of access.
It is not possible to develop or deploy applications in ServiceNow.
It is not necessary for a non-administrator to develop or deploy applications.
Use delegated development and deployment application.

wpProQuiz_correct: The ServiceNow Delegated development and deployment application enables non-administrators to develop and deploy applications.

Text: Who can access to schema maps, tables and column module?
wpProQuiz_correct: Correct Answer: D. Administrator

Text: What are the workflow activities?

Answers.Text: Waiting for approval, fulfillment, delivery, completed

wpProQuiz_correct: In ServiceNow, the workflow activities refer to the different stages or steps that a record goes through during the workflow process.

Text: When you have subject filled on email notification as well as on the notification template, which one will appear on the sent email?
wpProQuiz_correct: Correct Answer: B. Subject from Email Notification

Text: What does the attachment functionality in a kb article do?

Answers.Text: It will take you to a blank incident form
Read only data that is not editable on this form
It provides a choice of adding documents as attachments
Allow you to attach any other existing record in ServiceNow

wpProQuiz_correct: Correct Answer: C. It provides a choice of adding documents as attachments

Text: What is the purpose of the import set table?

Answers.Text: Used to import users data only
It acts as a staging area for records imported

wpProQuiz_correct: Correct Answer: B. It acts as a staging area for records imported

Text: How are users and groups related?
wpProQuiz_correct: Correct Answer: A. Many to Many

Text: What is a Service Now event?

Answers.Text: Business rules, client scripts, fields, forms and form sections, reports, tables, views and workflows
Create a new table and fill out he extend table field
It is an indication to the ServiceNow processes that something notable has occurred, e.g., approving a request, workflow, etc.
Semaphores, which control the number of user transactions that can be run in parallel. It makes sure there aren't too many things running at once.

wpProQuiz_correct: A ServiceNow event is an indication to the ServiceNow processes that something notable has occurred, e.g., approving a request, workflow, etc.

Text: What are the ways you can bring users into your ServiceNow instance?
wpProQuiz_correct: Correct Answer: D. All the above

Text: When can SLAs include actions be triggered on ServiceNow instance ?
wpProQuiz_correct: Anytime

Text: What's a module and application in the example … Incident > create new

Answers.Text: Incident is an application and create new is the module
Incident is a module and create new is an application
Incident and create new both are applications
Incident and create new both are modules

wpProQuiz_correct: Correct Answer: A. Incident is an application and create new is a module

Text: Which icon in the banner do you use to turn on the Application Picker and the Update Set Picker?
wpProQuiz_correct: To turn on the Application Picker and the Update Set Picker in ServiceNow, you typically use the Globe icon in the banner. This icon opens the application navigator, where you can switch between different apps and update sets15.

Text: Difference between Business Rule & Client Script?

Answers.Text: Business rule works on before insert, update and delete in a database & client script works only on Submit.
Business rule works on before or after Insert, update and delete in a database & client script works on Submit, on change, on Cell Edit & on Load.
Business Rule works on Browser side and client scripts works on Server side.
There is no difference b/w the two.

wpProQuiz_correct: Correct Answer: B. Business rule works on before or after Insert, update and delete in a database & client script works on Submit, on change, on Cell Edit & on Load.

wpProQuiz_correct: True

Text: What Details does a knowledge article hold? (Select all that apply)
wpProQuiz_correct:
A. Known errors
This option is correct. Knowledge articles can contain information about known errors, which helps users understand issues that have been identified and documented within the system. This aligns with the purpose of knowledge management to capture and share information about problems and their resolutions.

Answers.Text: It's a bunch of access controls for a table

wpProQuiz_correct: The role that allows you to personalize a list view on a ServiceNow instance is personalize_list.

This field is not there on SLA Definition page.

Text: Which is not Related to UI Action?
wpProQuiz_correct: Search is not directly related to UI actions. UI actions are elements that trigger specific actions or behaviors within a user interface, such as opening forms, executing scripts, or navigating to other pages. List links, form links, and form buttons are all examples of UI actions.

Text: SSO abbreviation is
wpProQuiz_correct: SSO stands for Single Sign On. In ServiceNow, and many other software applications, SSO allows a user to log in once and access multiple applications or systems with those same credentials.

Text: What is an order guide?

Answers.Text: It defines every table and field in the system. It contains information about a field's data type, character limit, default value, dependency and other attributes
It allows user to order everything they need for one particular request
It's a bunch of access controls for a table, i.e., show me all access controls for table

wpProQuiz_correct: An order guide in ServiceNow is:

Text: Where does the global text search appear?
wpProQuiz_correct: The global text search in ServiceNow appears in the Banner (Correct).

Text: You can limit Service Now access by IP ranges.
wpProQuiz_correct: The statement is TRUE (Correct). ServiceNow allows you to limit access based on IP ranges.

Create, edit, or delete system notifications for a particular channel.
Create custom notifications by subscribing to system notifications and applying desired conditions.

Text: What provides a guide for moving data from import sets?
wpProQuiz_correct: Out of the choices you provided, Transform Maps (Correct) are the primary guide for moving data from import sets in ServiceNow.

Text: Update sets cannot be merged.
wpProQuiz_correct: The statement is FALSE (Correct). Update sets in ServiceNow can be merged.

Text: Which tool is used to create dependencies between configuration items in the CMDB?
wpProQuiz_correct: The tool used to create dependencies between configuration items in the CMDB is CI Relationship Editor.
